productDescription: A coffee-flavored cake is typically baked in a circular shape with two layers separated by coffee butter icing, which may also cover the top of the cake
A traditional banana cake is made like a butter cake with the addition of mashed banana for flavour.
Cake that has rainbow colored sprinkles baked into the batter.
The 'lemony' flavour in a lemon cake is from the volatile oils which are present in the fruit's zest,(mainly nerol, limonene and citral).
Black Forest gateau consists of several layers of chocolate sponge cake sandwiched with whipped cream and cherries.
The main, and thickest, layer consists of a mixture of a soft, fresh cheese, eggs, and sugar.
Red velvet cake is traditionally a red, red-brown, crimson, or scarlet-colored chocolate layer cake, layered with ermine icing.

Cake made of layers of buttercream, meringue and chopped cashews.
Is a variety of cheesecake that is usually lighter in texture and less sweet than North American-style cheesecakes.
The cake sandwiches a custard or pastry cream that is smooth and velvety, with just a touch of vanilla.
